prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Brass, Bass, Guitar, Drums, Reed, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This composition features Brass, Bass, Guitar, Drums, and Reed, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This piece is comprised of Brass, Bass, Guitar, Drums, and Reed, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
This song has Brass, Bass, Guitar, Drums, and Reed, but Piano is not part of it.
